member.name: N:LillTek.Telephony
member.summary: Root namespace for the LillTek Telephony platform including NeonSwitch. See for descriptions of common code available for both the client and server sides of telephony applications. Please visit the documentation for the LillTek.Telephony.NeonSwitch namespace for a comprehensive overview of the LillTek Platform telephony capabilities.

member.name: N:LillTek.Telephony.Common
member.summary: Common library for the LillTek Telephony platform including NeonSwitch. See the documentation for the LillTek.Telephony.NeonSwitch namespace for a more comprehensive overview of the LillTek Platform telephony capabilities.
